rules_text:
Whenever one or more permanent cards leave your graveyard, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Whenever one or more Skeleton cards leave your graveyard, scry 1.
notes:
ARTed

Corpse Collector wants "skeletons leaving your graveyard" and then we have a ZOMBIE that cares about leaving your graveyard?? unacceptable oversight
